name: School Quest
description:
What is School Quest?

School Quest is a text only game that takes the player to an abridged journey into his last year of high school.

Try your best to increase your relationship with any of the five characters in the game.

The level of their relationships may go up or down, depending on what choices you make...

Features:

- A very simple interface. Just type in a number or a word (followed by Enter) to progress through the game!

- Over 80,000 words!

- Occasional bursts of twisted humour!

- Multiple endings!

- Marginally larger than 300kb to download!!

PLEASE READ!! First and foremost, I apologise for the lack of a save feature. I have not included one due to my limited programming knowledge, and furthermore, I never expected to make the game this long in the first place!

Honestly, my original plan was to make this into a simple ten minute game. One year of writing later, and it has turned into something a little bit bigger...

Expect the first playthrough to last 1-2 hours long. Additional playthroughs will be subsequently shorter, since the player will (hopefully!) have a better understanding of how the game works.
